turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I was looking to order some coffee from Starbucks .

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was thinking a caramel venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Fort Gratiot, Michigan.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caramel macchiato with whole milk to be picked up from the location in fort gratiot, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you. can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. That'll be it for me. Thank you.
